title: erosbook
author: erosbook
created_time: August 22, 2022, 05:47:30 PMLast edit: October 23, 2022, 04:40:01 PM by erosbook
content: ErosBook ICO - EROS token - Airdrop & BountiesAirdropErosBook is giving away a total of 3 million EROS (worth $75,000) to participants. Sign up and follow ErosBook on social media to earn a 400 EROS reward (worth $10). The airdrop reward will be reduced in each phase of the crowdsale. Join ErosBook ICO now and don't miss this opportunity! To view all the details and claim the airdrop reward, sign up here.Bounty ProgramThe ErosBook bounty program offers a total of 12 million EROS (worth $300,000) for users that contribute to promote the ICO. Amazing reward can be claimed for completing specified tasks, such as social media posts, youtube videos or reviews and articles. To know all the details and claim the bounties, sign up here.Twitter weekly campaign¬†¬†¬†up to EROS 800 EROS/weekFacebook weekly campaign¬†¬†¬†up to EROS 800 EROS/weekInstagram weekly campaign¬†¬†¬†up to EROS 800 EROS/weekBitcointalk weekly campaign¬†¬†¬†up to EROS 1600 EROS/weekReddit post bounty¬†¬†¬†up to EROS 1600 EROS¬†¬†¬†Ico review bounty¬†¬†¬†up to EROS 300 EROS¬†¬†¬†Blog / article bounty¬†¬†¬†up to EROS 1800 EROSYoutube video bounty¬†¬†¬†up to EROS 5400 EROSCreate an account now and start to get free EROS rewards & bountiesErosBook ICO main thread

comments.author: erosbook
comments.body: üîâ The seed sale of ErosBook ICO starts in less than 24 hours. Be ready! Tomorrow monday 29 at 12:00 UTC you can buy EROS for 0.005$, that's a 80% discount! Remember that you can get +5% EROS with the Affiliaite program. üéÅ At the same time, the Bounty program will open with amazing rewards for posting about ErosBook in twitter, facebook, reddit, and for publishing articles and videos on youtube. Create an account with the profile 'ICO investor / participant' to check all the details about the crowdsale and the bounty program.
